jobDescription: We are seeking a skilled Software Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality software solutions.

experience: 2+ years of experience in software development

experience: 3+ years of experience in UX/UI design

educationalRequirement: Master's or Ph.D. in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
